direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods validate ISIN codes but return different types of results (boolean vs. Object).
Both methods involve validating codes with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods validate codes, but implemented in different contexts (ISINValidator vs. CodeValidator).

Validation is required before checking the validity of ISIN codes.
Both methods verify codes and handle similar exceptions.
